Package com.spring.web.controller

Class QuestionController

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.controller.QuestionController
@Controller public class QuestionController extends Object
Controller used to handle all processes of Question Entity and Answer Entity
Author:
Cao Vinh Lam, Christian Lee, Samantha Jermyn

  • Method Details

    • getAllQuestions

      @GetMapping("/questionList") public String getAllQuestions(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieves all questions from the database and displays them
      Parameters:
      model - - List of Question objects stored as an attribute so it can be displayed on the page
      session - - Retrieve user id from session
      Returns:
      A HTML page listing all the questions currently stored in the database QuestionService questionService;

    • getAllQuestionsForTag

      @PostMapping("/questionListSorted") public String getAllQuestionsForTag(@RequestParam int id, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      filters the entire database of questions
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the user filtering the list
      model - - handles the objects being passed from the backend to the html frontend
      request - - gets the params from the form in the front end
      session - - stores the current login session of the user
      Returns:
      sends the user to the displayed question list

    • getAllQuestionsForTagIndex

      @GetMapping("/questionListSorted") public String getAllQuestionsForTagIndex()
      redirects a user to index when they try to access a post method without submitting a form
      Returns:
      returns to index page

      Returns:

    • createQuestionForm

      @GetMapping("/createQuestion") public String createQuestionForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Create an empty TempQuestion Object and pass to the question creation form
      Parameters:
      model - - TempQuestion object stored as an attribute to gather all information regarding questions and answers in the form
      session - - Retrieve user id from session
      Returns:
      A HTML page for creating question and answers

    • createQuestionObject

      @PostMapping("/createQuestionObject") public String createQuestionObject(@ModelAttribute("questionObject") TempQuestion questionObject, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Process creating question and answers and storing them into the database
      Parameters:
      questionObject - - TempQuestion object posted from the question creation form page with information regarding a question its answers
      session - - Retrieve user id from session
      Returns:
      Redirects user back to the questionList page

    • createQuestionObjectIndex

      @GetMapping("/createQuestionObject") public String createQuestionObjectIndex()
      redirects the user back to the index page when they try access a postmapping
      Returns:
      returns the index page

    • getQuestionDetails

      @GetMapping("/questionDetails") public String getQuestionDetails(@RequestParam int questionId, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieve selected question from the database and display its information and answers
      Parameters:
      questionId - - Id of the question selected
      model - - Question object stored as an attribute so it can be displayed on the page
      session - - Retrieve user id from session
      Returns:
      A HTML page displaying all details regarding the selected question

    • editQuestionForm

      @GetMapping("/editQuestion") public String editQuestionForm(@RequestParam int questionId, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Edit questionContent and answers of the selected question
      Parameters:
      questionId - - Id of the question selected
      model - - Question object stored as an attribute so its information can be edited on the page
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in for security
      Returns:
      A HTML page for editing question answers

    • editQuestionObject

      @PostMapping("/editQuestionObject") public String editQuestionObject(@ModelAttribute("questionObject") TempQuestion questionObject, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Process updated question answers and storing updated information into the database
      Parameters:
      questionObject - - TempQuestion object posted from the question edit form page with information regarding a question its answers
      session - - Retrieve user id from session
      Returns:
      Redirects user back to the selected question details page

    • editQuestionObjectIndex

      @GetMapping("/editQuestionObject") public String editQuestionObjectIndex()
      redirects the user to the index page if they try access a post mapping
      Returns:
      returns the user to the index page

    • deleteQuestionObject

      @GetMapping("/deleteQuestionObject") public String deleteQuestionObject(@RequestParam int questionId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Process deleting question and corresponding answers in the database
      Parameters:
      questionId - - TempQuestion object posted from the question edit form page with information regarding a question its answers
      session - - holds the session information of the logged in user
      Returns:
      Redirects user back to the selected question details page

    • viewUnreviewed

      @GetMapping("/viewUnreviewed") public String viewUnreviewed(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Gets all unreviewed questions
      Parameters:
      model - - attribute to pass to HTML
      session - - holds the session information of the logged in user
      Returns:
      page to see all unreviewed questions

    • finishReview

      @GetMapping("/finishReview") public String finishReview(@RequestParam Integer id, @RequestParam boolean value, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Will set the question related to the id to approved or rejected depending on value
      Parameters:
      id - - question id
      value - - boolean value of approval
      model - - attribute to pass to HTML
      session - - holds the session information of the logged in user
      Returns:
      returns to page to view all unreviewed questions

    • handleMissingParams

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.MissingServletRequestParameterException.class) public String handleMissingParams(org.springframework.web.bind.MissingServletRequestParameterException ex)
      this method is used to redirect the user to the index page if they try access a page that requires params without inputting params
      Parameters:
      ex - - this param is the error message that can be logged when the user doesnt type a param
      Returns:
      returns the user back the index page
